resources.string: "Place \"attractors\", \"repellers\", and \"spinners\" to manipulate the particles.\n License: GNU General Public License v3.0"
"Click for open Source Software we depend on! (Licenses)"

Some colour maps from/modified from ColorCET, CC-BY. Some Sounds mixed from freesound.org inc. CC-BY: "Rain on Windows, Interior, B.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) and CC0: FlatHill, bsyapril88, suoguolh, deleted_user_229898, jackthemurray, Lydmakeren, and Sandermotions.
"If you had fun, why not rate us on the Play Store? Thanks!"
